p: Adhering to the IHRs, France provides regular updates on the disease situation. Within Europe, EU member states are to report all HPAI outbreaks, of all subtypes. Around the world, between January 1, 2015 and April 8, 2016 the count of outbreaks numbered at least seven, and spanned from North America (2) across Europe (2) to Asia (3). 28
